article.headline: New Mexico St. 78, Panhandle St. 46
article.story: LAS CRUCES, N.M. -- Bandja Sy scored 12 points to lead New Mexico State past Oklahoma Panhandle State 78-46 on Thursday night. Renaldo Dixon added 10 for the Aggies (4-7). Tyrone Watson, Christian Kabongo and Gordo Castillo each scored nine. Marcale Marshall led Oklahoma Panhandle State (2-9) with 12 points. New Mexico State led 38-20 at the half after outscoring the Division II school 25-4 in the last 8:42 of the first half, including a 17-0 spurt. That run answered a 9-0 surge that had put Oklahoma Panhandle State up 14-13 with 9:15 left in the first half. New Mexico State shot 43.1 percent, while Panhandle State was 24.6 percent on 16-of-65 shooting. New Mexico State scored 21 points off 22 turnovers and outscored Panhandle State 32-12 in the paint.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
